input.transcript: Customer: We need to migrate analytics to AWS in Q1. Success is 30% faster reporting. Next steps: send estimate by Friday and schedule security review next Tuesday.
Customer: Budget is approved. CIO signs. Procurement will do redlines. We will share the final vendor list after the holiday.
Customer: We care about EU data residency and encryption at rest. We are evaluating AWS and Azure. Next step is a security workshop.
Customer: Can you send pricing? Also email me at maria@example.com. We will review internally and get back to you.
Customer: We might do something next year. No clear timeline. We just wanted to learn what a migration could look like.
Customer: Success is cutting outages in half. We need SSO integration. Next steps: you share a draft plan, we book a workshop, and we confirm who from procurement owns the paper process.
